name: Watson-Call-Center.v3

examples.text: Can you help me activate my software?
How can I activate the software? Does it take long?
How do I activate my software licsense?
How do I activate my sortware licsense? Can you help me with that?
How do I "turn on" my software license?
I don't know how to activate my software, but I think I need to
I need to request an activation code
Is this how I register my software license?
Is this how the software activation is done?
What are the steps I need to follow in order to activate my software?
What do I do with this activation key?
I'm interested to know what you sell and what industries you service.
Please describe the kinds of things you sell and what kind of customers you serve.
Tell me a little bit about what kind of business your company is
Tell me please a little bit about the kinds of businesses you are in
What are your companies main businesses and operations
What business operations and units comprise your company
What business units does your company operate
What business units does your company operate worldwide
What can you tell me about the kinds of businesses that your company is in
What industries does your company participate in
What is the structure of the your company business units and what do they sell
Are you a bot? I would rather talk to a live agent.
Can you transfer me to an agent
How about connecting me to a live agent.
I don't like talking to a bot
I want to chat with a real person
I would like to talk to a live agent please
I would rather talk to a human being
Please connect me to an agent
Please transfer to an agent
Transfer me please
Can you help me close my account?
How do I close my account?
How do I go about closing my account?
I'm going over to one of your competitors
I'm going to be switching providers
I've decided to shop with another company
I want discontinue using your service
I won't be doing business here an longer
Let's just discontinue this relationship
What do I have to do to close my account?
How many employees does your company have

How many employees work within your company or any of its subsidiaries
How many folks are part of the your company organization
How many people work for your company
How many workers get a paycheck from your company

What's the number of folks employed by your company in the US
Whats the number of your company employees in Turkey
Can you please tell me where the football stadium is?
Don't you guys have a football stadium or something? Where is it at?
In what city can I watch a game at the football stadium
In what city is the football stadium located?
I think the football stadium is located in downtown..isn't that right?
What is the name of the football stadium and where is it located
Where can footballers play at the university of Arkansas
Where is the football stadium
Where is the football stadium located
Where would I find your sports stadium?
Good morning
Good morning to you good sir
Good to see you Watson
Hello
Hey Watson, how's it going
Hi Watson, how are you
Howdy
Please to see you
Welcome back old friend
You're looking well, old chum
Can you help me assist our customers
Can you help me diagnose the problems
Can you help me look for solutions
Can you help me provide customer support
Can you review past problems to help me find answers
I need your assistance in supporting our customers by helping me find the solution
I need your help. I need you to find the best answer to the customer's problem
I need you to help me assist customers
Please help me assist our customers
Please help me support our customers
what can you do for me?
what kind of questions can you answer?
What questions have you been trained to answer?
Can I just open a ticket instead of chatting
Can I open a support ticket
Can you help me open a case
Enough of this. Just open a support ticket
How do I open a support ticket?
I don't want to talk to a bot. I would rather open a case
I want to open a case
I want to open a trouble ticket
Man, I just want to open a ticket
Please help me open a support ticket
Can you reset my password for me?
Help me. I need to have my password reset. I can't access anything I need.
How do I change my password?
How do you go about changing the password. I can't get into my email any longer.
I can't access Lotus Notes, can you help?
I can't get into my Lotus Notes anymore. What should I do?
I can't login into my computer. What's the problem?
I can't login to the system any more. The error message says my password has expired.
Man, what a drag. My password expired...can you help me
May Lotus Notes password has expired. How do I reset that?
My windows password has expired...but I don't know what to do about that
Can I get a good deal on a new portable generator?
Do you offer portable generators on your web site?
I'm looking for a portable generator
I need some new equipment for my garage. What are my options?
I need to get a new generator for my work
I've been browsing your web site for a new portable generator.
I want to buy a portable generator
I want to purchase some new equipment for my work
My old generator just gave out. Figured I could get a new one from you.
What kind of generators can I get from Caterpillar? I need a new one.
What kinds of portable generators do you offer?
Can Node.js leverage unified API?
Describe the Node.js threading model
Disk full resolution
How can I create a Java core file in WebSphere?
How do I power down DB2?
How do I shut down WebSphere Application Server?
How many admin consoles does WAS have?
How many types of WebSphere Administrative Console are there?
I am having strange npm issues...what do I do?
The top 5 reasons for DB2 server to be slow and cause login problems
What are top reasons of wireless network performnce problems?
What is the relationship between Framework and Node.js?
What is the url to access the administrative console?
Who invented Node.js and when did he do it?
How high does the pressure have to be for a chamber pressure switch to prevent a valve opening?
How much does DIW pH have to be for testing liquids in the FDS
I'm noticing AL, FE contaminants in the etching process
To prevent corrosion, what is the maximum moisture level for purity gases
What is the maximum pressure of the NH2400 pump
What is the needed pressure for a chamber pressure switch to stop a valve opening?
What is the top pressure limit of the NH2400 pump?
What moisture level must purity gases maintain to prevent corrosive condition?
What must the DIW pH be for testing liquids for the FDS
What's the maximum allowable operating temperature of the fan motor?
What tools are necessary to service the disgronificator?
Can you help me change my address in your system?
I have a new billing address now
I have a new mailing address now
I want to update my address
Please help me update my address
That's not the right address. How do I change it?
The address you have for me is no longer valid
Update address please
What address do you have for me. That's not right.. I want to update it.
You're send things to the wrong place. How do I change my address?
Can I get an extended warranty for this purchase? I got it 3 years ago.
Can you help me buy an extended warranty?
Can you help me extend my service policy, or do I need to speak to a human?
How much is your extended warranty?
I couldn't find out from your website how I could get an extended service policy.
I don't know what to do...how do I can an extended service policy for my equipment. The warranty has expired.
I want to buy an extended warranty. How do I do that?
I want to purchase a service policy for my recent purchase. That wasn't included in the original transaction.
My service police is about to expire. Can I renew that?
What should I do now that my service policy has expired. Do you think buying the extended warranty is worth it?

description: Conversational engine for the demo application highlighting the Watson API's in a call center context.

output.text:
An extended warranty has been purchased for your flat screen TV.
  • Manufacturer: $Manufacturer
  • Model: $Model
  • Serial Number: $Serial_Number
As of year end 2015, Acme employed just over 110,000 people worldwide.
Can we change your mind by offering you the next two months of service at a 50% discount? (The predictive model shows a propensity to accept this $C_Responded_Campaign of $CC_Responded_Campaign)
$castiron_response.Status_Message
Click HERE to reset your password.
Currently, you do not have coverage in @country. We can find a plan to add that coverage now if you like?
Do you want it for home or work use?

For 90 years, Acme has been making sustainable progress possible and driving positive change on every continent. Customers turn to Acme to help them develop infrastructure, energy and natural resource assets. With 2015 sales and revenues of 47 billion, Acme is the worlds leading manufacturer of construction and mining equipment, diesel and natural gas engines, industrial gas turbines and diesel-electric locomotives. The company principally operates through its three product segments - Construction Industries, Resource Industries and Energy and Transportation - and also provides financing and related services through its Financial Products segment.

Heinz Field, located in the North Shore neighborhood of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, is the home to the NFL's Pittsburgh Steelers and the NCAA Pitt Panthers. The stadium opened in 2001, after the controlled implosion of the teams' previous stadium, Three Rivers Stadium.

This license has been activated previously which is normally ok. Please indicate the reason it is being activated again using the form to the right.(--FORM--)partials/over_activation.html
To answer your question about your coverage, I need some additional information. Where you will be traveling to?

To reset a forgotten Lotus Notes password, follow these steps:
  1. Start Notes normally.
  2. Press Enter when prompted for the password.
  3. Press the button marked Recover Password.
  4. Select the ID file to reset.
  5. Select a recovery administrators whom you must call and enter in the Enter Passwords
  6. Enter your new password.
